FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: Context for programs management access control, will also be used for multi-tenancy

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: Human readable name of the program, does not have to be unique

FIELD.NAME: idnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique identifier of a program, multilang definitely not supported

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Program description text

FIELD.NAME: presentationjson
FIELD.COMMENT: Visual presentation of program, such as image files

FIELD.NAME: publicaccess
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 means visible to everyone, 0 means use cohorts for visibility

FIELD.NAME: archived
FIELD.COMMENT: Archived programs are hidden, non-mutable and mostly ignored, program must be archived before deletion

FIELD.NAME: creategroups
FIELD.COMMENT: Create course groups for each course in program

FIELD.NAME: timeallocationstart
FIELD.COMMENT: Restriction for allocations- allocations allowed from this date forward if set

FIELD.NAME: timeallocationend
FIELD.COMMENT: Restriction for allocations - allocations not allowed after this date if set

FIELD.NAME: startdatejson
FIELD.COMMENT: Calculation rules for user start date in program allocation

FIELD.NAME: duedatejson
FIELD.COMMENT: Calculation rules for user due date in program allocation

FIELD.NAME: enddatejson
FIELD.COMMENT: Calculation rules for user end date in program allocation

INDEX.NAME: idnumber
INDEX.COMMENT: Enforce unique idnumber for all programs

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_item
TABLE.COMMENT: Structure of programs - items representing courses and course-sets with their ordering and completion rules.

FIELD.NAME: topitem
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 for top most item representing program itself, NULL for all other items

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course reference, NULL if item is course-set (must not be set for top item)

FIELD.NAME: trainingid
FIELD.COMMENT: Training framework reference, NULL for sets (must not be set for top item)

FIELD.NAME: previtemid
FIELD.COMMENT: Previous item needs to be completed in order to allow courseid access, this is ignored for sets

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: Human readable name of course-set, copy of course.fullname if courseid set, copy of program name for top item

FIELD.NAME: sequencejson
FIELD.COMMENT: List of children with ordering and completion rules, optional start delay info if courseid set

FIELD.NAME: minprerequisites
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of required prerequisite item completions needed for this item completion - derived from sequencejson, 1 for empty set means cannot be completed, 1 if courseid set

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: Point-based value for item/set completion

FIELD.NAME: minpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Point-based alternative to minprerequisites

FIELD.NAME: completiondelay
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional completion delay

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_group
TABLE.COMMENT: Course groups that were created for course items

INDEX.NAME: programid-courseid
INDEX.COMMENT: Only one group for program-course combination

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_prerequisite
TABLE.COMMENT: Internal item dependency map - it is built automatically from program items using sequencejson

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_cohort
TABLE.COMMENT: Members of these cohorts may browse non-public programs before allocation

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_source
TABLE.COMMENT: Program allocation sources representing different means of user allocation

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of allocation - manual, self, cohort, certification, etc.

FIELD.NAME: datajson
FIELD.COMMENT: General source allocation settings

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_request
TABLE.COMMENT: List of people waiting for allocation to programs, entry is deleted after allocation

FIELD.NAME: datajson
FIELD.COMMENT: Request details created by source

FIELD.NAME: timerejected
FIELD.COMMENT: Rejected request blocks retry, delete rejected record if retry allowed

INDEX.NAME: sourceid-userid
INDEX.COMMENT: Only one request for allocation of user per source, delete rejection if they are allowed to retry

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Means of user allocation

FIELD.NAME: archived
FIELD.COMMENT: All enrolments are suspended when user allocation is archived and completion is frozen, useful when user is removed from cohort when auto allocating

FIELD.NAME: sourcedatajson
FIELD.COMMENT: Extra allocation data belonging to source, it can store waitlist history, person who allocated mannually, etc.

FIELD.NAME: sourceinstanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Some external reference that can be used from source classes

FIELD.NAME: timeallocated
FIELD.COMMENT: Date when user was allocated to program

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Date when program opens for this user

FIELD.NAME: timedue
FIELD.COMMENT: Expected completion date

FIELD.NAME: timeend
FIELD.COMMENT: Date when program closes for this user (progress is fronzen after this date and enrolments are suspended)

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: User program completion date, NULL means program not completed

FIELD.NAME: calendarupdated
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 means calendar needs update - used when program name or description changes

INDEX.NAME: programid-userid
INDEX.COMMENT: Only one allocation of user per program, archive and delete allocation if change needed, or use other evidence in case of certification certification

INDEX.NAME: archived-timestart-timeend
INDEX.COMMENT: Used in queries that deal with non-archived active allocations only

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_completion
TABLE.COMMENT: Program item completions, added after item completion

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Item completion date

INDEX.NAME: itemid-allocationid
INDEX.COMMENT: Only one completion per item and user

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_evidence
TABLE.COMMENT: Alternative evidence for completion of a program item

FIELD.NAME: evidencejson
FIELD.COMMENT: Evidence details

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Item completion date

INDEX.NAME: itemid-userid
INDEX.COMMENT: Only one evidence per item and user allowed

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_cert
TABLE.COMMENT: List of certificate templates used for program completions

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: Template for program certificate

FIELD.NAME: expirydateoffset
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for absolute dates, duration in seconds for relative dates

INDEX.NAME: templateid
INDEX.COMMENT: Soft reference to tool_certificate_templates.id, one template can be used in multiple programs

TABLE.NAME: tool_muprog_src_cohort
TABLE.COMMENT: Program can be automatically allocated to the members of these cohorts if configured in that way
